hero.description: UniVision Studio crafts custom web applications, mobile apps, and universal solutions—software that works seamlessly on every device and platform, from phones to computers to the cloud.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Comprehensive digital solutions tailored to your needs

webDesign.title: Website Design
webDesign.description: Bespoke designs optimized for WordPress, Odoo, or fully custom architectures with a focus on conversions.

webApps.title: Custom Web Applications
webApps.description: Powerful, fast web applications built with the latest technology. Whether you need a sophisticated e-commerce platform, management system, or business dashboard, we create solutions that grow with your business.

mobileDev.title: Mobile App Development
mobileDev.description: High-performance native and cross-platform mobile experiences for iOS and Android platforms.

crossPlatform.title: Desktop & Universal Apps
crossPlatform.description: Software that runs on Windows, Mac, and Linux. Write once, deploy everywhere. Perfect for companies that need their tools working consistently across all employee computers.

uiUx.title: User Experience Design
uiUx.description: Beautiful, intuitive interfaces that customers actually enjoy using. We focus on making your software easy and delightful, so users stay engaged and come back.

consulting.title: Software Strategy & Consulting
consulting.description: Guidance on choosing the right technology, scaling your systems as you grow, and updating aging software to modern standards. Think of us as your technical advisor.

about.title: Our Studio
about.subtitle: Where Quality Meets Scalability
about.description1: We're not just developers—we're digital architects. Our team of experienced developers and designers builds solutions that don't just work; they deliver real results and happy users.
about.description2: Whether you're a startup or an established company, we specialize in building software that: stays reliable, grows smoothly as your business expands, and is easy to maintain and update. Every project, big or small, gets our full attention and expertise.

stats.studioFocusDesc: Your Vision, Our Dedicated Team We keep our core team in-house for seamless collaboration and unwavering quality on every project.
stats.scalableTechDesc: Built to Grow With You—We use technology that won't hold you back. As your business grows from 100 to 10,000 users, your software keeps working smoothly. No major rebuilds needed.
stats.expertDesignDesc: Beautiful & Easy to Use—Our designs aren't just pretty; they're intuitive. Users understand how to navigate your software instantly, which means more engagement and better conversion rates.
stats.agileDeliveryDesc: Transparent, Collaborative, On Time With agile workflows and clear communication, we deliver iteratively—keeping you in the loop at every stage.

ai.title: Building the Future with Artificial Intelligence
ai.description: At UniVision Studio, we leverage the latest AI technology to solve real business problems. From automating repetitive work to giving your software intelligence, we're not just following trends—we're building the future. And we do it in ways that make sense for your business.

intelligent.title: Smarter Software
intelligent.description: AI that learns from your users. Software that gets better the more it's used, personalizing experiences and anticipating customer needs.

automation.title: Automate the Repetitive
automation.description: Stop wasting time on routine tasks. AI handles data entry, reporting, scheduling, and more. Your team focuses on strategic work that actually moves the needle.

precision.title: Smart Insights
precision.description: AI analyzes your data to reveal patterns humans miss. Make confident business decisions backed by real insights, not hunches. Stay ahead of trends.

showcase.title: Experience Our Proprietary AI Assistant
showcase.description: We've developed our own advanced AI system—a testament to our expertise in artificial intelligence. Try it yourself and see how we're pushing the boundaries of what's possible with AI technology.
showcase.note: Experience firsthand the quality and innovation we bring to every AI project

experience.title: Proven Experience
experience.subtitle: Trusted with High-Stakes Projects
experience.description: We've successfully delivered projects for companies across multiple countries and industries. From healthcare to finance, we've built software that businesses depend on. Reliability isn't just a promise—it's our track record.

stats.globalDeploymentsDesc: We have successfully launched applications used across multiple countries, handling localization and international standard compliance.
stats.enterpriseStandardsDesc: Our team integrates seamlessly with existing enterprise architectures, ensuring secure and high-availability solutions
stats.multiPlatformEcosystemsDesc: Connected Systems—We create ecosystems: your web portal, mobile app, and desktop tools all work together seamlessly. One unified experience for your users.
stats.modernTechDebtReductionDesc: Modernizing Old Systems—Legacy software slowing you down? We transform outdated systems into modern, fast, maintainable solutions. Same functionality, better performance, easier to update.
